  • Classes in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm used by com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm 
    Class Description
    IDrmInitData
    Encapsulates initialization data required by a MediaDrm instance.
    IDrmInitData.SchemeInitData
    Scheme initialization data.
    ILicenseManager
    Interface to the License Manager.
    IVirtuosoDrmSession
    Manages a DRM session.
    IVirtuosoDrmSessionManager
    Manages a DRM session.
    KeySetId
    Internal storage for the key set ID data for a DRM key.
    SessionId
    Internal storage for the Session ID, which is normally delivered as a byte array.
    UnsupportedDrmException
    Thrown when the requested DRM scheme is not supported.
    VirtuosoDrmSessionManager
    Manages a DRM session, retrieving stored keys for offline viewing or retrieving keys whilst online.
    VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener
    Listener of VirtuosoDrmSessionManager events.
